name: policy_exists_rls_disabled
title: Policy Exists RLS Disabled
description: Detects cases where row level security (RLS) policies have been created, but RLS has not been enabled for the underlying table.
detail: Table \`public.kdp_books\` has RLS policies but RLS is not enabled on the table. Policies include {"Service role can manage books","Users can view own books"}.

name: policy_exists_rls_disabled

detail: Table \`public.kdp_cookies\` has RLS policies but RLS is not enabled on the table. Policies include {"Service role can manage all","Users can insert own cookies","Users can update own cookies","Users can view own cookies"}.

name: rls_disabled_in_public
title: RLS Disabled in Public

detail: Table \`public.kdp_cookies\` is public, but RLS has not been enabled.
